review: I'm on the road a lot for work. I've tried other "sticks" but none of them work with hotel wifi. THE FIRE STICK DOES!!!! I love it. All my streaming in a hotel room with the crappy, free, hotel wifi!! I love this stick!
author: Badkarma013

review: When the firestick works, it's great, but it has a lot of connectivity issues with my router even when my other devices are working perfectly. I might switch to google's chromecast, but for now I am using the firestick.

review: Purchased this to replace my older Roku. It was very simple to set up and has nice parental controls. Very easy to operate. I like how you're able to listen to your amazon music and view photos stored on your cloud. Access to Netflix, Amazon Instant Video and also apps from the app market. Happy with this purchase.

review: Very good cost/performance ratio. Not the premium buffering and navigation performance, but for $39 it is absolutely a great value and it is functioning as expected.
